sentences.en: " Do you know what you are doing is very risky?
sentences.cn: “ 你可知道这事情是靠不住的.

sentences.en: "Don't do anything yet," he warned. "Too risky."
sentences.cn: “暂时不要采取行动，”他警告说，“太危险。”

sentences.en: Are Certain Cuts of Beef More Risky Than Others?
sentences.cn: 切碎的牛肉比其他形式的牛肉更危险 吗 ?

sentences.en: Buying a secondhand car is a risky business .
sentences.cn: 买二手汽车是有风险的。

sentences.en: Doctors say it’s too risky to try and operate.
sentences.cn: 医生说动手术风险太大。

sentences.en: Doing human rights work is risky business. That comes with the territory.
sentences.cn: 做人权工作是要冒风险的。这是难免的。

sentences.en: He is well aware how risky this investment is.
sentences.cn: 他心里对这项投资的风险十分清楚.

sentences.en: He was known for risky tactics that ranged from audacious to outrageous.
sentences.cn: 他以大胆甚至是骇人听闻的冒险战术而闻名。

sentences.en: Horse breeding is indeed a risky enterprise.
sentences.cn: 养马确实是个有风险的营生。

sentences.en: Investing in airlines is a very risky business.
It all sounds decidedly risky to me.
sentences.cn: 对我来说,这一切听起来太危险了.

sentences.en: It can be a dangerous course of action which might be sound in theory but — ahem — perhaps a trifle risky in practice.
sentences.cn: 这可能是一次危险的行动，在理论上听着无缝可击，但——呃哼——真做起来却可能有点冒险。

sentences.en: It is most risky to go and examine an active volcano.
sentences.cn: 去探察活火山是非常危险的.

sentences.en: It may be risky but we will chance it anyhow.
sentences.cn: 这可能有危险,但我们无论如何要冒一冒险.

sentences.en: It's risky to assume that we know what voters will be thinking in a year's time.
sentences.cn: 自以为我们了解投票人在一年后的想法是很危险的行为。

sentences.en: The case against is twofold: too risky and too expensive.
sentences.cn: 反对理由有两点：太冒险而且太昂贵。

sentences.en: There was a dicey moment as one of our party made a risky climb up the cliff wall.
sentences.cn: 当我们的一位队友冒险攀爬崖壁时，出现了比较危险的一刻。
